name: Livingston Baptist Church
description: Baptist church affiliated with the Kentucky Baptist Convention and Southern Baptist Convention. Provides worship services, Sunday school, children's church, Bible study, and spiritual guidance. Offers Celebrate Recovery program for individuals dealing with addiction and other life challenges. Welcoming congregation serving the Livingston, Kentucky community.
source: Verified from Kentucky Baptist Convention website, Facebook page, and multiple church directories
hours_of_operation: Sunday School 10 AM, Worship 11 AM, Sunday Night Service 6:30 PM, Wednesday Bible Study 6:30 PM
notes: This is a Baptist church that provides spiritual services and community support. The church offers regular worship services, Sunday school, children's programs, and Bible study. They also provide Celebrate Recovery program for individuals dealing with addiction and other life challenges. The church is affiliated with the Kentucky Baptist Convention and Southern Baptist Convention.
